mapper.select: select c.scd_sq,c.scd_desc,c.scd_title, q as DTL_CONTENT_ID, w as DTL_CONTENT_ID2 from (select scd_sq, max(DTL_CONTENT_ID)q, min(DTL_CONTENT_ID) w from sm_dtl_scd_tb group by scd_sq) d, sm_scd_tb c where d.scd_sq=c.scd_sq and USER_ID=#{USER_ID} order by c.scd_sq desc

select to_char(d.daily_ymd,'YYYY/MM/DD DAY')as"daily_ymd", t.city_nm,c.DAY_CNT, d.DAILY_ORD,o as daily_cnt, t.area_code, m as dtl_content_id from sm_daily_scd_tb d, sm_scd_tb c, (select daily_sq,city_nm,scd_sq,area_code,max(DTL_CONTENT_ID) m, count(daily_sq) o from sm_dtl_scd_tb group by daily_sq,city_nm,scd_sq,area_code)t where d.scd_sq=#{scd_sq} and t.daily_sq= d.daily_sq and c.scd_sq = d.scd_sq order by d.DAILY_YMD

SELECT t.DTL_ORD, t.DTL_CONTENT_ID, t.PLACE_NM, t.CITY_NM FROM SM_DTL_SCD_TB t, sm_daily_scd_tb d where d.scd_sq=#{scd_sq} and t.scd_sq=d.scd_sq and t.daily_sq=d.daily_sq order by d.DAILY_YMD, t.dtl_ord

select c.scd_sq, c.scd_desc, c.scd_title, q as DTL_CONTENT_ID, w as DTL_CONTENT_ID2 from (select scd_sq, max(DTL_CONTENT_ID) q, min(DTL_CONTENT_ID) w from sm_dtl_scd_tb group by scd_sq) d, sm_scd_tb c, SM_SHARED_USER_TB s where d.scd_sq=c.scd_sq and s.USER_ID=#{USER_ID} and s.scd_sq = c.scd_sq order by c.scd_sq desc

SELECT lat map_y, lng map_x FROM SM_CITY_TB where areacode = #{area_code}
and sigungu_code = #{sigungu_code)
